Description:
Key location - value plus! - OPEN CANCELLED
Absolutely perfect for the savvy first home buyer seeking maximum value where convenience is a must or the astute investor looking to tap into the consistent growth achieved in this pocket. Consisting of two generous bedrooms, light filled open plan kitchen, dining and lounge room with central bathroom. Features include gas heating, gas top cooking, private yard and single carport. Well positioned within easy distance to public transport, Highton Village, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road. Major investment in the area including the ever expanding Deakin University, Epworth Hospital and Waurn Ponds train station underpins your investment. Don't miss your opportunity, enquire today.

Description:
Outstanding Family Living in the Province Estate!
Situated in the heart of "new Highton" and boasting three internal living zones this family home is sure to impress with it's size and thoughtfully conceived floor plan. Add to this Barrabool Hills Plaza being a short stroll away and the package for relaxed, convenient living is complete.
On entry to the right is the spacious first living area /study - perfect for the kids to play in or for an adult to utilise as a study in "work from home 2020 style". To the left of entry is the master bedroom complimented by adjacent large walk in robe and double vanity ensuite. Walk further down the passage of the house to see handy storage cupboards built into the wall. The open plan dining, kitchen and second living follow with northern light setting a vibrant, modern living tone. The long island bench provides an abundance of space for food preparation and breakfast bar. The generously sized walk in pantry will be cherished by all and the Asko dishwasher is a staple of quality. Further enhancing the floor plan is the third living area/rumpus at the rear which can be closed off anytime for convenience - children or teenagers congregating needn't interfere with adult time in the main living area. Stroll into the southern side of the house to discover three more well sized bedrooms, all with built in robes.
Separate toilet to the bathroom is a nice feature. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling take care of temperature requirements throughout the house. A covered outdoor living space is immediately available on exit to the side of the house on the northern side. Solid exposed aggregate grace the outdoor area and offshoot paths. A flat rear yard and decking at the rear provide further outdoor entertaining options.
Nearby Barrabool Hills Plaza is home to popular Fast Food Restaurants, Anytime 24-7 Gymnasium, Woolworths Supermarket, BWS, Bakery, Medical facilities & Chemist. Ring Road access also not far away providing smooth commuting to Melbourne & the Surf Coast. The complete package is right here folks!
Insights: 12 Avondale Avenue, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2007 and 108 other 4 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
QUIET COURT LOCATION
State Government now permitting public OFI's for groups of 20 people, social distancing still applies.
We regret that residents from Metropolitan Melbourne or Mitchell Shire must not attend an open for inspection at this stage. Please contact the agent to organise a virtual inspection.
We are all looking for a quiet life at the moment and what better than a court location. Close to all major amenities in Leopold including all you need to work, rest and play.
Lounge, Kitchen, meals and main bedroom overlook north facing U-shaped decking. Winter warmth through the expansive glass windows, clerestory windows and doors.
Currently leased until March 2021 with fantastic tenants who look after the home as if it is their own. This would be an excellent addition to your investment portfolio.
The Bellarine Peninsula is an area of choice to live as people move to regional locations and choose to work remotely during this interesting time. It is predicted that working remotely will be an ongoing option even when we can return to some semblance of normality.
A minimum of twenty four hours' notice is required for inspections due to being tenanted.

Description:
LIFESTYLE, LOCATION AND LOW MAINTENANCE LIVING
This properties second to none location, combined with a quality renovation both internally and externally, has resulted in a truly magnificent makeover delivering an ultra modern façade with quality appointments throughout.
Meticulously styled and presented the home comprises three bedrooms, master with ensuite, second bedroom large enough to be an enviable guest room or bunk room/kids retreat and a third bedroom with external access, giving scope for additional uses. An open plan kitchen/ meals and family area with plenty of natural light, separate lounge with cosy gas log fire, central main bathroom and European laundry complete the very impressive internal footprint. Sliding doors from the family room lead out onto the undercover carport area with freshly laid exposed aggregate concrete feature that doubles up as an additional relaxing outdoor retreat option.
The property is situated in one of Torquay's most desired addresses, 100 metres from The Esplanade walk way to Whites Beach and the same short distance to Deep Creek Reserve with its delightful nature walking track, tennis courts and playground making this home a fantastic lifestyle choice for many years to come.
Other features include stylish cladding finish, updated fixtures and fittings, reverse cycle cooling/heating, north facing undercover alfresco area, garden shed, low maintenance allotment with established gardens, a short walk to all services this vibrant coastal town has on offer, creating an exciting opportunity to purchase a fantastic property with nothing to do.
The residence would be perfect for those looking to downsize, someone looking to secure an excellent investment or holiday haven in a great location. Call now to arrange your inspection.

Description:
ISLAND DRIVE GARDEN OF EDEN
Set against a spectacular coastal backdrop, this beautifully presented home is close to all amenities and within a short walking distance to The Sands golf course, Peppers Resort, Whites beach, sporting/recreation facilities, schools, child care centre, parks, public transport and positioned on a large 801m2 allotment in the ever-popular South Beach Estate.
All on one level the home comprises 3 bedrooms, double doors open the elegant master bedroom which features a sizeable en-suite including large bath and walk in robe, 2 further bedrooms one with built in robe and central family bathroom. A formal dining and living room of grandiose size to enjoy is separate to the generous open plan kitchen, meals and lounge area, this space is enveloped by windows allowing natural light to stream through and take in the stunning gardens complete with fish pond and bridge. The undercover entertaining area with built in BBQ sits adjacent to the meals area. A large laundry fitted out with cabinetry currently being utilized as a sewing room could be also be a study space.
Additional features include, a brand new gas central heating system, 2.7m ceilings, 3000 litre water tank, ceiling fans, watering system, fernery, double lock up garage with rear door access and plenty of parking all this and more surrounded by a garden of Eden, the most private beautiful setting you will see with so many areas to relax in the outdoors. Ideal for those looking to secure a permanent residence, downsizer or retiree. You won't want to look past this home, call today to book your inspection!!

Description:
Quiet court community vibe.
AUCTION NOW WEDNESDAY 5TH AUGUST AT 7:00PM.
Abundant light filled accommodation is the hallmark of this delightful residence where space and convenience counts. Well positioned amongst friendly neighbours in a peaceful court location this is the ideal lifestyle you are seeking.
Consisting of four large bedrooms, main bedroom with updated ensuite, light filled lounge, updated kitchen and dining area leading to outdoor entertaining. Features include a glorious tree top vista from the living areas with big land of approx. 911sqm, double carport, full landscaping, gas heating, split system A/C, dishwasher and garden shedding.
Well positioned within easy distance to High Street shopping, Oberon Primary, School, Belmont High School and public transport. Only a short hop to Highton Village, Barwon River walking tracks, Waurn Ponds shopping, Aquatic Centre and the Ring Road taking you to Melbourne in an hour. For those seeking big accommodation in a unique location enquire today!

Description:
The Epitome Of Fine Family Living
With a superb renovation completed over the last four years, this residence promises a truly enviable lifestyle.
Set on a corner block in a peaceful pocket of Belmont, everything you could possibly need is within easy walking distance. The vibrant Highton Village is a short stroll away, along with public transport and the Highton Reserve sporting grounds. The morning school run will be a breeze with Roslyn Primary School, Belmont High School and Barwon Valley School all moments from your front door. To top it all off, the Barwon River walking trails are close by.
Hardwood floors enhance the freshly painted interiors, which seamlessly combine retro charm with on-trend style. Northern light sweeps through the open plan living/dining/kitchen zone, where both the open fireplace and front windows hint at the home's art deco heritage. With French doors open onto the north-facing deck, you'll be enticed to sit back and soak up the sunshine. The kitchen will impress with stone waterfall benchtops, a walk-in pantry and smoked mirror splashback. Pendant lights highlight the breakfast bar, while Bosch stainless steel appliances include a dishwasher, wall oven, 900mm gas cooktop and rangehood.
The brand-new Master Bedroom provides a contemporary oasis for parents with a walk-in robe and chic en suite. Boasting floor-to-ceiling tiling, dual vanity in messmate timber, large shower and separate toilet, every inch of this space exudes style. Independent access to the Master Bedroom is another bonus. Three additional bedrooms with built-in robes are tucked away in a separate wing, close to the main bathroom and laundry with storage. The outdoor studio offers immense versatility as a kids retreat, artist's studio, or even a home office.
With bamboo lining the fence, you'll love the sense of privacy this property offers. The sheltered alfresco sets the scene for outdoor entertaining, while the secure backyard will delight with mod grass and established trees. The single lock-up carport provides parking. Other features of this stunning property inc. ducted heating, evaporative cooling, an outdoor shower, and freshly painted exterior. Dont miss this chance to embrace the lifestyle you've been dreaming of in Belmont!
Insights: 17 Brocka Avenue, Belmont VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 53 other 4 bedroom house in Belmont have recently been sold.

Description:
Looking For The Perfect First Home or Investment?
Set in a quiet court, this property presents a terrific opportunity for first homebuyers, investors and families alike!
Public transport is footsteps from your front door, while a short stroll will find you at the Waurn Ponds Creek walking trails. Greenville Kindergarten and Mandama P.S are within walking distance, while a variety of nearby sporting grounds will keep the whole family entertained. With a Retirement Village and Aged Care Facility just moments away, this is also an ideal location for those who wish to be close to elderly parents. Enjoy easy access to the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, the Surf Coast Highway shops & Leisurelink Aquatic Centre.
It's easy to see that this home has been well-loved over the years, with the original interiors in spotless condition. Northern light sweeps through the lounge, which overlooks the front garden. The open plan family/meals/kitchen zone flows onto the sheltered alfresco, while the kitchen is well equipped with a built-in pantry and cooking appliances (oven, gas cooktop, rangehood). All three bedrooms feature built-in robes, with the Master Bedroom boasting direct access to the bathroom. The laundry and separate toilet complete the functional layout. The sheltered alfresco spills onto a generous sun-drenched area - putting the elements in place for casual outdoor living! The backyard is home to a large veggie garden that is waiting to be planted out. A variety of fruit trees invite you to enjoy apples, apricots, pears and more straight from the branch.
- Built by B. Filipi Constructions
- Gas wall heater and air conditioner
- DLUG & garden shed
- The back gate provides access to the large reserve
- New hot water service and toilet as of 2019
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
The Ultimate Family Lifestyle Awaits!
If youve been searching for the perfect home to raise your family, then look no further! Set upon approx. 765m2 and boasting a north-facing backyard, youll need to act swiftly to secure this Grovedale gem!
When it comes to family-friendly locations, it doesnt get much better than this. Both Grovedale West P.S. and Grovedale College are within easy walking distance, meaning you never have to worry about school traffic again. Public transport and the Heyers Road shops are also a short stroll away, along with the Grovedale Community Hub and Burdoo Recreation Reserve. Enjoy living moments from the Waurn Ponds Shopping Centre, Waurn Ponds Train Station and Ring Road access.
With freshly painted interiors enhancing the home, theres nothing left to do except move in and enjoy. Featuring a bay window, the lounge creates a generous space for relaxation while flowing through to the versatile retreat. The open plan living/dining/kitchen zone opens onto the rear porch, while the kitchen features a built-in pantry and Bosch stainless-steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, electric cooktop, rangehood). Parents will love that they keep an eye on little ones playing in the backyard, while theyre busy cooking dinner!
The Master Bedroom is graced with built-in robes and direct access to the main bathroom, which will delight with a spa bath, shower and single vanity. Two additional bedrooms boast built-in robes, while the laundry and separate toilet complete the layout. Youll be in comfort all year long thanks to ducted heating and two air conditioners.
Lined with established trees, the north-facing backyard is a dream come true for families. The outdoor entertaining zone provides the perfect setting for casual barbeques, while a mature palm tree makes a statement in the middle of the spacious lawn. The in-ground trampoline is sure to provide hours of endless fun. The lock-up tandem garage offers room to set up a workshop, plus rear vehicle access to the backyard perfect for caravan, boat, or trailer storage. The garden shed and rainwater tank add the finishing touches to this terrific property. Inspect without delay!
Insights: 140 Heyers Road, Grovedale VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 143 other 3 bedroom house in Grovedale have recently been sold.

Description:
First home buyers, investors, this one's for you.
All the hard work has been done for you. This elegantly updated home in the sought-after locale of Highton, walking distance to the village, can be moved straight into. Upon entry, you are welcomed by stunning timber floorboards, which really sets the tone and character of the property. Offering three spacious bedrooms, two with built in robes and are all serviced by the refined central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles. The generous, light filled open plan kitchen and dining flows effortlessly into the generous light filled living space. Featuring stone benchtops, double sink, island bench and plenty of cupboard storage space, this gorgeous kitchen is perfect for all home cooks. With direct access out onto the outdoor deck from the kitchen/living area, effortless indoor/outdoor entertaining friends and family will become second nature. Out onto the north-westerly facing backyard, lies loads of grassed space for kids and pets to play.
Conveniently positioned within walking distance to the Bellaire Primary, Highton Pre-School, Barwon Valley School and McDonald Reserve and just moments from the Highton Village and public transport, your daily commute will become seamless. Features include ducted heating throughout, split system and the long driveway providing ample space for secure parking. Situated on approximately 765sqm and in such a dress-circle position, this charming property is sure to draw some attention.

Description:
Approx. 1003m2 of Pure Potential!
Occupying approx. 1003m2, this property presents an irresistible opportunity in a riverside pocket of Highton! Renovate the original home, wipe the slate clean to build your dream family abode, or use the expansive land size for development (STCA)!
A carefree lifestyle is yours to keep with Buckely Falls and the tranquil Barwon River just moments away. A short stroll will find you at Queens Park, which is home to beautiful picnic areas, sporting grounds and the Queens Park Golf Course. Young families will love that the Cannes Reserve playground is positioned right at the end of the street. The Barrabool Hills Shopping Plaza is conveniently close by, while nearby schools and private colleges take great care of families.
Still in original condition, the interiors are overflowing with potential. An open fireplace graces the front lounge, which unites with the dining room via bi-fold doors. The kitchen takes care of all your cooking needs with a Miele dishwasher and stainless steel cooking appliances (Baumatic wall oven, Miele combined electric and gas cooktop, SMEG canopy rangehood). The family room opens onto the indoor pool and spa zone, which features glass shutters overlooking the north-facing backyard. Three bedrooms with built-in robes share close access to the main bathroom and powder room, while the laundry features external access. A split-system air conditioner and heater provide additional comfort.
The deck steps down onto the spacious backyard, which is packed full of potential. Established trees create a private wonderland, while the alfresco area inspires casual outdoor living. The single lock-up carport and long driveway provide off-street parking.
Youll need to act swiftly to secure this rare opportunity! Inspect without delay!
Insights: 2 Desmond Street, Highton VIC 3216 was last sold in 2020 and 138 other 3 bedroom house in Highton have recently been sold.

Description:
A Rare Jewel!
This wonderful townhouse is immaculately presented and is ideal for downsizers and young families looking for low maintenance living. Situated in a quiet location, yet conveniently close to the Highton Shopping Centre and local schools. The home is quality built and boasts spacious rooms throughout, with the light-filled living areas taking advantage of its northerly aspect. Featuring three large bedrooms, the main includes plantation shutters on the windows, a walk-in robe and an ensuite with a sizable shower, while the remaining two bedrooms include built-in robes, a spacious lounge and dining area, a functional galley style kitchen with gas cook-top and electric oven and dishwasher, the living area includes a cosy gas log fire for the cooler months, a family bathroom with shower and separate bath and a double lock-up garage with internal access. Extra comforts include central heating and evaporative cooling throughout. Outside the home is surrounded by beautiful established gardens, the bluestone paved area is private and is perfect for a relaxing Sunday breakfast, a double gate provides handy side access to the yard.
This home will certainly impress and is a must inspect.

Description:
An entertainers delight!
Youll love:
This impressive home comprises 37 sqaures of quality indoor living thats split over 3 levels with a 7m solar heated pool & multiple entertaining areas outside for your ultimate enjoyment.
The main living room on the ground floor with its double height ceiling & central gas log fire is the perfect place to unwind after a long day.
A spacious kitchen equipped with quality features including a 900mm oven, beautiful stone island benchtops, and a large walk-in pantry thatll please even the fussiest cook.
Set on an elevated 603m2 allotment, it also offers ocean views from the upstairs master & balcony and captures beautiful sunsets over rolling green hills west of Duffields Road.
Plus:
Dry off on the north-facing deck that sits above the pool post-swim or relax by the outdoor wood heater and watch tv in the partially covered pool lounge!
All 4 bedrooms are spacious with WIRs & ceiling fans, including the master with an ensuite.
Other features include a generous study & bar/rumpus room, indoor & outdoor dining zones, the gallery-style landing & upstairs living area, plus central heating & cooling throughout.
Theres also a double remote garage, amazing storage at every turn & loads more.
Walking distance to schools, shops & Spring Creek Reserve if youre looking to upgrade or upsize your family home then this entertainers delight could be the ONE!

Description:
Location and Amazing custom home
Craftsmanship completed by award winning Hamlan homes with display quality Inclusions. Family friendly home with zoned living, large rear yard for everyone to enjoy and a short direct stroll to world class sandy beaches. Beach house living with convenient access to Lisieux & Torquay coast primary and Surf coast secondary college, Torquay north shopping complex with a park fronted outlook. Impeccable quality presented as brand new with timber look flooring, high ceilings, designer kitchen with 3 bench spaces and stone splashbacks.
Say goodbye to energy bills with double glazing windows & doors, solar panels with Tesla powerwall.
Generous sized 4 bedrooms with master suite and huge walk in robe, 2 large living areas on both levels, glass balcony overlooking park, timber staircase and extended garage for extra storage and ease for 2 cars with rear roller door.
Large rear yard with enough room for a pool.
Additions to note:
Smeg appliances, stone bench tops throughout, shower niches, 300 x 600mm tiles to bathrooms, insitu shower bases, zoned evaporative cooling and ducted heating, exposed aggregate paving, pivot entry door, alarm system and colorbond metal roof.
Please contact for private appointment

Description:
THE ULTIMATE FAMILY RETREAT
This as new architecturally inspired builders own home encapsulates the essence of seaside living at its finest in the heart of Old Torquay.
A stunning combination of period features, neutral tones and Caesar stone blend in magnificently to create this two storey luxury residence perfect for any family. With a keen eye for detail the sundrenched interior design has been methodically and tastefully thought-out.
With zoned air conditioning and heating throughout, this four bedroom, three bathroom residence boasts three separate living rooms, which open directly out to the private north facing landscaped gardens.
The open plan living / dining area features a chef's kitchen with butler's pantry, detailed cabinetry and Miele appliances complete with coffee machine and integrated double fridge plus freezer. The Jetmaster open fire is ideal for those cooler winter nights while the bi-fold doors open out to a wonderful alfresco area and private north facing landscaped gardens, perfect for entertaining family and friends all year round.
The highest quality fittings and fixtures have been incorporated to exceptional standards. No corner has been cut with other notable inclusions such as, NSW spotted gum flooring, three metre high ceilings, ducted vacuum, open fire place, an abundance of storage and Caesar stone bench-tops throughout all wet areas.
Additional features include an oversized four car garage with storage room / workshop, separate bathroom all situated on a generous 804m2 approx. allotment.
Only a few hundred metres to Fisherman's Beach and The Esplanade and within a short walk to Torquay's town centre, vibrant cafes and restaurants, this is a rare opportunity to enjoy the Torquay lifestyle you so richly deserve!
Insights: 139 other 4 bedroom house in Torquay have recently been sold.

Description:
Just one left.
If you're searching for a brand-new property positioned in a prized location & boasting high quality inside and out, then look no further. These townhouses on offer are located within walking distance to the renowned Highton Village, schools including Belmont High and Roslyn Primary, parks, public transport & with easy access to the Ring Road.
Gorgeously presented and with high ceilings throughout, this property encompasses three bedrooms with built in robes, master with its own ensuite and walk in robe. Both the master and main bathroom are complete with with floor to ceiling tiling and rain fall shower heads. Stylish kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and ample cupboard/bench space which flows into the dining and living area. Through sliding doors, the private and secure courtyard is the perfect area for entertaining friends and family all year round with your built in BBQ. Landscaped gardens & single car garage.
Features include - Ducted heating and refrigerated cooling throughout, hardwood flooring, built in BBQ outside, built in microwave, LED strip lighting along alfresco, landscaped gardens, alarm system and double car garage.

Description:
Picture Perfect Cracker - Belmont Living at its Best!
Located in the increasingly popular and trendy suburb of Belmont, this updated weatherboard home epitomises upmarket family living at its very best!
Just minutes from the High Street shopping strip and well located in one of Geelongs best school zones, this period stunner provides the young family an affordable, yet excellent quality renovation in the heart of all the action. This quiet location allows for walking distance to immediate amenities.
The family room is spacious, an absolute entertainers dream. The master bedroom includes a walk in robe with full en-suite and the family bathroom services the remaining 3 bedrooms. This homes floor plan can be flexible as you like, with the option of the fourth bedroom being transformed into a second living space, kids retreat, or home office. The classically cool and modern kitchen provides updated cooking appliances and plenty of cupboard space.
Beautiful period features include timber flooring which complement the warm decor with a modern colour palate. The house has zoned central heating and split system cooling. The backyard is fully landscaped with a great little veggie patch, perfect for kids, and boasts a large timber deck for alfresco entertaining all year round. A lock up garage provides ample car accommodation or a great shed for the handyman.
Nothing to spend - just put your feet up and enjoy the best of Belmont living and what is has to offer!
